item.title: Awesome Terminal Setup with iTerm2, ZSH and Oh-My-Zsh
item.description: Are you bored with the default terminal of Mac? Want to turn your terminal into something more interactive and colorful? Well here is the iTerm2 and oh-my-zsh for rescue. iTerm2 is a Mac OS terminal replacement, download it from here or install it using homebrew by executing 1 2 brew install cask brew cask install iterm2 Oh-My-Zsh is an open source, a community-driven framework for managing your zsh configuration.
